New Records: Stephen Curry set a new NBA three-pointer record by making all eight of his three-point attempts for the first time in his career.
Stephen Curry became the first person in league history to go at least eight-for-eight on three-pointers and reach double-digit assists in the same game.
Key Match Events: Stephen Curry finished with 30 points and 10 assists.
Jonathan Kuminga chipped in 20 points off the bench.
Draymond Green, Andrew Wiggins, and Dennis Schroder each scored 15 points.
